name: test_e2e_with_logs[017_SQLI_BYPASS_003]
description:

| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_003` |
| **Name** | Whitespace character WAF bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
